channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP YouTube Lyte
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP YouTube Lyte

item.title: CVE-2021-24419|2024-08-03T19:28:23.802Z -- unknown -- wp%20youtube%20lyte
item.description: The WP YouTube Lyte WordPress plugin before 1.7.16 did not sanitise or escape its lyte_yt_api_key and lyte_notification settings before outputting them back in the page, allowing high privilege users to set XSS payload on them and leading to stored Cross-Site Scripting issues.
